src:
Piden arreglar un gran bache céntrico en City Bell

04 Nov 2019, 05:08

Vecinos de la zona de 465 y 13 A, City Bell. se quejan por un “importante” bache “, desde hace meses. La calle del reclmo está ubicada cerca del centro y a una cuadra del Camino Centenario.

text:
They ask to fix a big downtown pothole in City Bell

04 Nov 2019, 05:08

Neighbors in the area of 465 and 13 A, City Bell. They complain about an "important" bump "for months. Reclmo Street is located near the center and one block from the Centennial Road.
